1.0.name: wordpress/qtranslate-exporter
1.0.description: This is a helper plugin to be able to use the WordPress Exporter to export one of the languages used with qTranslate into a XML file. Without this plugin qTranslate will export the content with all languages including the langueage separation comments. The XML file can than be used to backup your data or to import each language into it's own blog or even into a Multisite WordPress installation.
